remarks: Inference adding common consequents in an implication, thereby interchanging the original antecedent and consequent.  Copy of ~ imim1i with a different proof.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.)
statement:
wl-imim1i.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
wl-imim1i $p |- ( ( ps -> ch ) -> ( ph -> ch ) ) $.
